---
name: TEF2_promoter
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae TEF2 promoter
prefix: TACA
suffix: AACT
sequence: 
---

Promoter region of the TEF2 gene encoding translation elongation factor 1-alpha in S. cerevisiae. This promoter provides strong constitutive expression similar to TEF1, serving as a duplicate for essential translation functions.
